ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: How about a 9th level cleric?  The huts outside of crushbone give me very little experience now, but I m nervous about going into Crushbone solo with all the
ygData.messageBody:
How about a 9th level cleric? The huts outside of crushbone give me very
little experience now, but I'm nervous about going into Crushbone solo with
all the trains that run through there.

Tyren
Dwarf Cleric

-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>

Crushbone is very dangerus area i dont know what lv do you have but as i
spend there from my 6 to 11 lv i know it very vell moust important is to
move from a entrance tunel it is a train magnet. You must find any place
out of trains rutes. some places at slaver huts are safe. If you can say
what lv are you i can give you precise indications where to go.
<snip>
